Articles.Content: Will the Career Option be available rather than sandbox in 0.21 or is that planned for future updates?
I do not believe it will be available just yet. Just the foundations. It's coming soon, though. Very soon...

This update is just for laying the foundations for career mode and as such won't be available yet. A few updates down the road it will be though. I also don't believe that sandbox mode is going to be removed and that the two will exist in together.
So does that mean other than the new graphics for the space center and the save-break there won't be any other noticeable changes in the new update on the player end?

So does that mean other than the new graphics for the space center and the save-break there won't be any other noticeable changes in the new update on the player end?

There's probably a reason saves are being broken, and that reason sure as hell isn't "to add the new visuals for the KSC". I don't know exactly what was important enough to make them push it back for a while, but it must be rather big, and I don'T think it's just work under the hood.

Squad are also hoping to put in the new and improved SAS which will go a very long way to improving the stability of craft and reducing RCS fuel consumption, and will also improve player control over craft. Read C7's Blog entry on SAS for more info.
